title: unesco_heritage_Humayun's_Tomb,_Delhi
text:
Name: Humayun's Tomb, Delhi. short_description:

This tomb, built in 1570, is of particular cultural significance as it was the first garden-tomb on the Indian subcontinent. It inspired several major architectural innovations, culminating in the construction of the Taj Mahal.

. date_inscribed: 1993. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 77.25056. latitude: 28.59333. area_hectares: 27.04. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: India. Region: Asia and the Pacific. iso_code: in. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
